Class JsAbstractTextTransformer

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.dev.jjs.impl.JsAbstractTextTransformer
Direct Known Subclasses:
JsFunctionClusterer, JsIEBlockTextTransformer
public abstract class JsAbstractTextTransformer
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for transforming program text.
